DOC.brief_summary: prediction MI patient chest pain nondiagnostic ECG do 2 week
DOC.detailed_description: Myocardial infarction remain one leading cause mortality morbidity involve high cost care . Early prediction helpful preventing development myocardial infarction appropriate diagnosis treatment . Artificial neural network open new horizon learn natural history disease predict cardiac disease . Methods : A total 935 cardiac patient chest pain nondiagnostic electrocardiogram ( ECG ) enrol follow 2 week two group base appearance myocardial infarction . Two type data use patient : nominal ( clinical data ) quantitative ( ECG finding ) . Two different artificial neural network - radial basis function ( RBF ) multi-layer perceptron ( MLP ) - use .
DOC.criteria: patient chest pain refer ER nondiagnostic ECG 1 ) Absence history myocardial infarction 2 ) Absence bundle branch block , WolfParkinsonWhite abnormality , ventricular hypertrophy previous ECG sign myocardial infarction , 3 ) Absence history percutaneous coronary surgery coronary artery bypass grafting , 4 ) Absence ECG abnormality attributable drug digoxin tricyclic antidepressant .
